summary: Comprehensive testing of IXA Digital website (Node.js/Express/LowDB rebuild). All backend APIs working correctly (100% pass rate). Frontend UI fully functional with all features tested.

backend: Admin login with admin@ixadigital.com / admin123 - SUCCESS
Admin login with invalid credentials - Returns 401 correctly
Admin dashboard statistics endpoint - Returns submissions and tickets counts
Admin settings GET/PUT - Branding, email, SEO, reCAPTCHA settings
Admin tickets list and view - Shows TKT-000001, TKT-000002
Admin submissions list - Shows contact form submissions
Contact form submission - Creates new submission with ID
Support ticket creation - Generates TKT-XXXXXX number
Ticket tracking with TKT-000001 and john@example.com - SUCCESS
Public branding endpoint - Returns logo_url and company_name
Public SEO config endpoint - Returns site_title, description, keywords
Public reCAPTCHA config endpoint - Returns enabled status and site_key
frontend: Homepage loads correctly with logo in header
Footer displays 'Maintained & Developed By Urbanesafe LLP' credit
Admin login page - Form inputs and login button work
Admin dashboard - Shows statistics cards and submissions list
Admin settings page - Branding tab with logo/favicon upload
Admin tickets page - Lists tickets with filter buttons
Contact form modal - Opens and accepts input
Support ticket modal - Opens and shows all required fields
Ticket tracking page - Search form and ticket details display
Logo displays correctly in header and footer

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in React components for missing useEffect dependencies (AdminDashboard.jsx, AdminSettings.jsx, AdminTickets.jsx, ContentEditor.jsx) - LOW priority
seed_data_creation: Test data created during testing: TEST_Contact User submission, TEST_Ticket User ticket (TKT-000002)
context_for_next_testing_agent: IXA Digital website is fully functional. Node.js backend on port 8001, React frontend on port 3000. LowDB JSON files in /app/backend-node/database/. All admin features, contact form, support tickets, and ticket tracking working correctly. Footer has hardcoded Urbanesafe LLP credit as required.

features_verified.admin_dashboard: Shows statistics for submissions and tickets
features_verified.admin_settings_branding: Logo and favicon upload sections present
features_verified.contact_form: Submission creates new entry in database
features_verified.logo_display: Displays correctly in header and admin pages
